channel.title: Debian on Boffins Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Debian on Boffins Blog

item.title: Upgrading Debian Bookworm to Trixie on a SheevaPlug MMC
item.description: Upgrading Debian Bookworm to Trixie on a SheevaPlug MMC.

item.title: Installing Debian Bookworm on a SheevaPlug MMC
item.description: Installing Debian Bookworm on a SheevaPlug MMC.

item.title: How to Unbrick a SheevaPlug
item.description: You may think your ‘Plug is dead, but if you can plug it into a computer you can resurrect it.

item.title: Delete Your Mastodon Favourites
item.description: Removing old posts is a trivial matter now that Mastodon allows for automated post deletions, removing old favourites is not so straighforward.

item.title: Apache Traffic Analysis Using GoAccess
item.description: A guide on how to implement real-time visitor traffic analysis on an Apache web server using GoAccess.

item.title: Upgrading Debian on a Gemini PDA
item.description: There is an upgrade path to Debian 10 but an ‘apt-get upgrade’ will fail. This bash script will help.

item.title: GoogleAIY a RaspberryPi and a Scroll pHAT
item.description: I got my RaspberryPi powered GoogleAIY box to talk nicely to both Google and a Scroll pHAT.
